about.title: M콄ku
about.content1: He Kaihangarau P콞manawa Rorohiko m캐tanga ahau n콄 Aotearoa e mahi ana hei Kait캐tari Full Stack Matua ki [Trade Me](https://trademe.co.nz), te [5 o ng캐 pae tukutuku tino toro](https://www.similarweb.com/website/trademe.co.nz/) o Aotearoa.
about.content2: He tangata ng캐kau nui, ng캐kau m캐haki, me te hiahia ki te waihanga i ng캐 p콞naha m캶haro hei whakatika i ng캐 raru hira. Kei te kimi mahi au i te whenua o Kanata. 游꼐
about.content3: I 콄ku w캐 whakat캐 ka whakatangi au i te kita, ka retireti hukarere hoki. He pai ki ahau ng캐 [p캐p캐ho ipurangi](https://lists.pocketcasts.com/2d425db2-b2c1-4999-be5a-63840ff200d5), ng캐 [kiriata a Studio Ghibli](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Studio_Ghibli_works#Feature_films), me te hanga i [ng캐 mea rorirori i roto i te waehere](http://pjpscriv.com/animal-spin/) m콄 te ngahau. Kua 캐whina au ki te hanga i t캡tahi [pukaemi](https://ingridandtheministers.bandcamp.com/album/kill-the-sights), t캡tahi [whakaaturanga whare tapere](https://tldrify.com/vev), me t캡tahi [pukaemi i roto i te whakaaturanga whare tapere](https://www.aucklandfringe.co.nz/programme-2019/how-to-write-an-album).

w1.title: Kait캐tari Full Stack Matua
w1.content: Ko Trade Me te m캐kete tuihono nui rawa atu i Aotearoa, 캐, ko ia te [5 o ng캐 pae tukutuku tino toro](https://www.similarweb.com/website/trademe.co.nz/). Kei te mahi au i te r콄p콞 Marketplace, e hanga ana i ng캐 캐huatanga m콄 ng캐 kaihoko nui.

e1.title: Tohu Paetahi P콞taiao i te P콞taiao Rorohiko
e1.institution: [Te Whare W캐nanga o Wikitoria o Te Whanga-nui-a-Tara](https://www.wgtn.ac.nz/)
e1.content: I ako au i te P콞taiao Rorohiko me te P캐ngarau ki Te Whare W캐nanga o T캐maki-makau-rau. I whakawhiwhia e au te Tohu Paetahi P콞taiao i te tau 2017.

p1.title: Dot Match
p1.content: He k캡mu t콄mua-toru e whakanoho ana koe i ng캐 ira o te tae kotahi kia whiwhi piro. I hangaia ki te HTML Canvas me te TypeScript, m캐 te whakamahi i t캡tahi p캐tengi raraunga NoSQL m캐m캐 hei tiaki i ng캐 taumata tiketike me ng캐 tono 캐huatanga. I runga i Google Cloud.

p2.title: P콞kaha P콄taka M캐k콞
p2.content: He taup캐nga tukutuku 캐huatanga kotahi e tango ana i ng캐 uara p캐mahana me te haum캐k콞, 캐, ka whakahoki mai i t캡tahi 'p콄taka m캐k콞' - te p캐mahana ka taea e te tinana te tae atu m캐 te m캐tao m캐 ng캐 werawera. I hangaia ki te Angular, m캐 te whakamahi i Chroma.js ki te waihanga i ng캐 p캐k콞.

p3.title: Kaiwhakaatu R캐
p3.content: He taup캐nga tukutuku m캐m캐 e whakaatu ana i te roa o te p콄 me te roa o te r캐 i te w캐 kotahi. Ka taea e ng캐 kaiwhakamahi te huri i te w캐 me te w캐hi kia kite ai r캐tou i te rereketanga o te roa o te r캐, i runga i te w캐hi me te w캐 kei hea koe i te ao. I hangaia ki te Angular, m캐 te whakamahi i te API Google Maps m콄 ng캐 kaupapa w캐hi.

p4.title: Mahere Karere
p4.content: He taputapu hei torotoro i 콄 raraunga Facebook Messenger. Tirohia ng캐 karere katoa i roto i t콄 r콄p콞, k캐tahi ka ruku hohonu ki ng캐 karere motuhake. Tirohia ng캐 whakar캐popototanga, me te t캐tari m캐 te r콄p콞 k콄rerorero, te kaituku, me 캡tahi atu paearu. He k콄paki mai i te [kaupapa taketake](https://github.com/adurivault/FBMessage) n캐 캡tahi tauira W캶w캶. I whakahouhia ki roto i Angular, m캐 te whakamahi i NgRx (Redux) m콄 te whakahaere k캐wanatanga, 캐, D3.js m콄 te whakaatu raraunga.

footer.content: Tirohia te w캐hi taketake o t캡nei pae tukutuku [i konei](https://github.com/pjpscriv/pjpscriv.github.io/)
